text: Herbert Augustus Hutchisson (April 19, 1915 – August 14, 1968; last name often mis-spelled Hutchison) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Columbus Athletic Supply and averaged 8.0 points per game. He also competed for other teams in semi- professional leagues. ==References== Category:1915 births Category:1968 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Ohio Category:Columbus Athletic Supply players Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Otterbein Cardinals men's basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Dayton, Ohio Category:Sportspeople from Springfield, Ohio
title: Herbie Hutchisson
